title: Beetroot, Horseradish & Crème Fraîche Dip
summary: You can never have too many hor d'oeuvre recipes, so give Beetroot, Horseradish & Crème Fraîche Dip a try. One portion of this dish contains roughly 1g of protein, 3g of fat, and a total of 52 calories. For 57 cents per serving, this recipe covers 3% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 6. It is perfect for The Super Bowl. 1 person were impressed by this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 5 minutes. A mixture of beetroot, crème fraîche, horseradish sauce, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so scrumptious. It is brought to you by BBC Good Food. Overall, this recipe earns a rather bad spoonacular score of 28%. Similar recipes are Smoked salmon with horseradish crème fraîche & beetroot, Pollack, beetroot & potato traybake with lemony crème fraîche, and Clementine & vodka-baked salmon with beetroot crème fraîche sauce.
